item.description:
Hey guys,

the past weeks were pretty wet and the few sunny days just didn't fit my schedule. For tomorrow weather.com reports nothing but blue sky and sun. Therefore, I wanted to do a Massabesic ride before the tides turn against us again ;-)

In the past there had been some confusion about the meeting point. Please note that we'll meet in the parking lot on Depot Road. If you check the location on Google Maps, there is no actual Depot Rd 220 but it should pretty accurately show you the location of the parking lot. Also, please write down my cell phone # 848-448-6663 to let me and the other riders know in case you get lost or stuck in traffic.

See you at the trail,

Christoph
item.name: Long time, no see... Massabesic on Wednesday
